Any plugin that rotates (ad) blocks every x seconds or minutes? **Update 1** I am testing http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/randomtext/ , but it does not seem to rotate even though I do not have a caching plugin running. **Update 2** jQuery on jQuery howto Blog seemed promising, but it grabs content from a file and not let's say content from a different HTML element. **Update 3** Checking http://forums.asp.net/t/1777232.aspx/1?Fade+In+Out+between+two+divs for jQuery `animate()` with 'setTimeout`and`fadeIn()`and`fadeOut()` All rather new to me and wondering if I can combine this Tickertype. **Update 4** I have added some jQuery to rotate two divs, but I cannot seem to be able to keep the text widget I use to rotate these two divs of a fixed size.
